transcript:
Customer: Ho aaj gali gali aavaj sajaenge, aaj pag pag palak bichhaenge, aaj sukhe hue ped fal jaenge.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello. Good evening sir.
Executive: Ha boliye.
Executive: Good evening. Sir Poonam baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ha boliye.
Executive: Sir abhi aapke account manager change ho gaye. Abhi mai hi hu sir. Aapki pehle bhi mere se baat hui thi. To mera number save kar lijiyega. Kuch bhi issue aata hai to aap mujhe hi call kijiyega. Maine message bhi kar diya hai sir aapko. Thik hai? Aur jo aap URL ka bol rahe hai uske liye bhi maine mail kar diya hai sir. Thik hai?
Customer: Thik hai. Wo URL apna firm ke naam se rahega na pura?
Executive: Ha ha. Kis name se bataiye sir ek bari?
Customer: Solution.
Executive: Ek second. Apna firm ka naam hai Solution. Hai na?
Customer: Solution natural business hai na. Wo natural wala apne ko nikalna hai. Dusri baat hai ki ek aur cheez maine aapko boli thi.
Executive: Ha.
Customer: Pichli baar bola tha sir maine.
Customer: Uska TrustSeal ka kya kar rahe ho? Matlab uska certificate ka?
Executive: Ha ji sir ye isme kya karna hai Solution Pharma?
Customer: Ha Pharma nahi karna hai. Solution kar do bas utna hi bol.
Executive: Bas thik hai?
Customer: Thik hai sir iske liye mai mail kar deti hu. Wo ho jayega aapka. Thik hai?
Customer: Thik hai thik hai thik hai chalo. Baki kuch bhi issue aata hai mera number save kar lijiyega. Mai aapke account manager hu.
Customer: Ha thik hai baki aap one week aapka off kab rehta hai matlab weekly off?
Executive: Sir hamara na Saturday Sunday off rehta hai.
Customer: Aapka Saturday off rehta hai sir?
Executive: Ha ji sir Saturday off rehta hai. Bataiye waise kuch issue hai to aap mujhe call kar sakte hai. Message kar sakte hai. Maine aapko number maine message kar diya hai. Mai chahta hu ki Saturday ya last week week ke last me jaise Saturday ko apna update hota hai. Lead bhi update hota hai. Us din hum log kuch discuss discuss kar le kaam ke liye ki kaisa kya chal raha hai kya nahi ho raha hai.
Executive: Thik hai koi nahi mai Saturday ko aapko connect kar lungi. Thik hai mai connect kar sakti hu. Sir agar kuch issue aata hai sir kal bhi mai available rahungi kal mai kal mai kar sakti hu aapko.
Customer: Thik hai. Kal hamari working bhi hai sir. Thik hai?
Customer: Ha thik hai koi dikkat nahi sir. Mai mai chahta hu ki Saturday ko mera bhi matlab samajh lijiye hafte me ek baar hum log baat kare kam se kam koi kaam na ho to bhi kya dikkat aa rahi hai kya ho raha hai kuch update aa rahe hai. Samajh rahe ho na mai kya bol raha hu. Ya mere ko kuch issue to nahi hai mere ko kuch samajh kya hai na September me mai bhi phone nahi lagaunga fir beech me aapko aur aapko bhi nahi lagaunga fir kya hai na Monday Monday ko aap iska kaam kar lo fir.
Executive: Ha thik hai thik hai sir. Koi nahi mai Saturday ko aapko weekly review kar liya karungi. Thik hai?
Customer: Ha ha mai ye chahta hu ki Saturday ko aap mujhse baat kar liya kare. Matlab kaise hi nahi taise hi matlab haal chaal hi le le taki kya hai na kuch hoga to mai aapko bol dunga. To aap us pe aaram se kaam kar lijiyega.
Executive: Ha ji sir thik hai. Saturday ko kal bhi waise to last Saturday hamari working hoti hai sir thik hai to kal bhi aap. Ha koi baat nahi ye ye kam se kam mahine me ek Saturday to apna kaam hai.
Executive: Ha ji sir thik hai. Baki kuch bhi issue aata hai mera number save kar lijiyega.
Customer: Apan jya vishayi bolat aahat tyanni aapla call...[call disconnects]
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants URL in the firm name.

- Customer inquired about TrustSeal certificate status.

- Customer wants weekly updates on Saturdays.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed URL will be in firm name.

- Executive said she will mail regarding URL.

- Executive agreed to provide weekly updates on Saturdays.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Positive



@@@Key Topics:

- url, trustseal, weekly updates, account manager
